Text.Page:
Other gutrend go crazy. Cah-razy! Don't know what happened. Go over mountain for a week, come back, everyone crazy.

Gutrend listen no more. Must get rid of them. Only way. Desert Fire tribe {@LinkCreature:18#8#destroyers} and {@LinkCreature:18#9#prophets} need to be gone.

May not have told full truth before. May have cast spell. Bad spell.

You clean up Kunchara's mess. Take this.
